Title: Directs the public service commission to undertake a study of consumer protections adopted by electric corporations and utilities
Summary: Directs the public service commission to undertake a study of consumer protections adopted by electric corporations and utilities; includes reporting on the adequacy of the public service commission's assistance to customers facing disconnection of utility service.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the public service commission to undertake a study of consumer protections adopted by electric corporations and utilities
